The Dentist

Dr Sufia Rahaman Brishty

BDS(DU)
Trained Orthodontics
Consulting Dental Surgeon

The Dr. Sufia Story

Dr. Sufia Rahaman Brishty is a graduate of the Dhaka University (DU), from City Dental College. She is working as a Consulting Dental Surgeon in Haris Family Dentistry. She had successfully completed training on advanced Orthodontics,Fixed Brace System by OSTEEM (AIC, Korea), well trained in restorative and cosmetic care, trained in digital dental photography. To re main up-to-date on the latest in dentistry, Dr. Sufia attends dental lectures, workshops and continuing education courses. Her BMDC Registration number is- 5508. Dr. Sufia is a member of this prestigious dental association: Bangladesh Dental Society.

A safe haven for people with teeth

Dr. Sufia has built a trustworthy reputation for professional dentistry in a friendly atmosphere focused on dental care ranging from preventive to orthodontics dentistry. Her focus at Haris Family dentistry has always been aimed at providing convenience and comfort for her patients, from the initial exam through the final treatment. Family Dentistry

“I’m proud to provide families with a dental experience they can trust. I provide patients with the latest in technology in a modern office space supported by a caring staff.”

make an appointment

DR. HARIS MUHAMMAD WALI-UR-RAHMAN

BDS(CU), DDS(BSMMU)
ASSISTANT PROFESSOR
DEPT. OF CONSRVATIVE DENTISTRY AND ENDODONTICS
BANGLADESH DENTAL COLLEGE AND HOSPITAL

The Dr. Haris Story

Dr. Haris Muhammad Wali-ur-Rahman is a graduate of the Chittagong University (CU), from Dental unit of Chittagong Medical College. He had completed his post graduation degree DDS, from Banghabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), former IPGMR. He is working as a Assistant Professor of Department of Conservative Dentistry and Endodontics in Bangladesh Dental College and Hospital. Successfully completed training on engine driven endodontic preparation by DENSPLY. Trained in Dental Implant (AIC, Korea). To remain up-to-date on the latest in dentistry, Dr. Haris attends dental lectures, workshops and continuing education courses.His BMDC Registration number is- 2094 Dr. Haris is a member of this prestigious dental association: Bangladesh Dental Society.

We are currently accepting new patients and we would love to say “Hello”. You can contact us by
calling +880 1787 667977

with any questions or you could simply request an appointment.

At Haris Family dentistry, our practice motto is smile again.

Follow us on
official facebook page and
Dr-Haris Dr-Brishty facebook page

For over 12 years, Dr. Haris has had his name on the door providing thousands of patients with caring and professional dental health services right here in the heart of town. Dr. Haris continues to work there with his amazing staff of over 5 years.

Smile Again

I love making people smile

Dr. Haris believes that helping others have better experiences when “going to the dentist” is just as important as making sure that once they get there, the treatment fits their needs. Seeing his patients leave after their appointment happy and smiling inspires his to improve and become a confident dentist.

The latest technology helps my patients

At Haris Family Dentistry our service model is aimed at providing convenience and comfort for our patients, from the appointment scheduling to the professionally applied treatment. This includes the latest in technology including same day root canal treatment by protaper, safer Digital X-rays, advance brace system for ortho-correction and the Intra-Oral Camera.
